lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that dollars are my vote in this economy.:

I vote for others' financial independence...
I vote for gender equality in opportunity...
I vote for supporting those brave enough to ask for help...
I vote for economic prosperity as emigration prevention...

I vote for making a difference $25 at a time!
I believe our collective voice is as strong as any millionaire's!

lenders.occupational_info: Employed at American Express

lenders.name: Ace
lenders.occupational_info: entertainment

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I would like to purchase or have an HD Format Camcorder kit donated to me. Many kits  can be found at bhphotovideo.com. The current equipment I have is outdated and I am unable to provide HD quality productions. I would also like to purchase an entry-level professional camera to start a photo site, similar to the video site I currently operate. I plan on making major modern day improvements to my website, showtimeweb.com.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have been recording marching band events for various organizations since 2003. I basically serve as a videographer / photographer for the marching bands. I am sent an invitation and I go and record the event. I then post the entire event to the internet in the form of video clips and photo galleries. That way the bands can use them for various exposure needs. If the director request a DVD, I will also create one for them.

I have never charged for my work. I love marching bands and I do this for the love of music. And I know first hand that many bands cannot afford a videographer to do what I do for them. I do everything from recording, editiing to publishing and have even created 3 web sites for bands.

My website is sort of a "YouTube.com" for marching band fans. I have been at this for almost 7 years and I love what I do. The website, hosting, domain, cost traveling events, are all covered by me.

I would really like to have HD equipment to keep up with the times. So i am asking for your help to obtain it.

Anymore questions feel free to email me, chris@showtimeweb.com

Thanks, Chris

lenders.name: AJ's
lenders.occupational_info:
I am currently working on starting a not for profit organization called AJ's Haven.  A & J are the initials of the first name of my children and this foundation is a promise that I will not put them in another domestic violence situation again.  In addition, the promise goes on to state that I will go to help others get out of domestic violence by starting not for profit organization called AJ's Haven.  It's a three step organization to help domestic violence survivors with indivdual, family and group therapies to get them out of the violence and to stay out.  The second goes to assist them with finding them lot term affordable safe housing and the third, aftrer one year of couseling getting them some assistance with legal services to help wth divorce, custody and child support issues that go hand in hand with the abuse through the judicial system.  

What many indviduals don't realize is that domestic violence happens even when orders of protections are issued in order to protect the families form teh physical, mental and emotional abuse.

lenders.name: Rick

I will offer full dinner/beverage and entertainment selections, featuring live comedians who are nationally recognized, concert performances and live professional dance.  My plans have been reviewed and verified to ensure a sizeable return to any investment on an ongoing basis.

lenders.name: Rugged Maxxx
lenders.occupational_info:
RUGGED MAXXX is a new 100% herbal supplement that is the new standard in sexual performance. RUGGED MAXXX utilizes several herbs which aid in the enhancement of size, increase in libido, and overall stamina that not only you will benefit from, but a difference your partner will see and feel. The main herbs of RUGGED MAXXX’s natural blend include the following:
• Epimedium
• Panax Ginseng
• Rhodiola Rosea
There are no hidden ingredients in RUGGED MAXXX and the natural herbal blends promote increased blood flow which aids in better performance. Better blood flow to the body’s tissues not only is physiologically linked to the enhanced sexual pleasure but also overall better health.
One (450mg) capsule of RUGGED MAXXX includes the beneficial qualities of:
• Prompt efficacy within 20 minutes after intake
• A boost in both  testosterone level and sexual stamina
• The natural aphrodisiac effect to excite sexual organs
• Powerful & long lasting erections
• Kidney sufficiency, energy boost, reduced backache
• No prescription requirement
Better health is something that is most strived for and with the herbal benefits offered by RUGGED MAXXX that can be accomplished.

I also have two children who have special needs and have to juggle the task of being a single parent with work and children. lenders.occupational_info:
In my business i buy, sell and trade saltwater rare and exotic coral. i get most of my coral import from Indonesia, but some time i do go to the wholesalerto cherry pick. every morning i wake up and check all my message and check to see if there is any purchase. if not, i just answer all my message. if there is order, i then bag and pack the order and ship them out. 
i also console people that are new to the saltwater hobby and those that have been in the hobby for a while, but still have question.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a business-minded person with strong analytical and customer service skills. I have experience working with people’s needs: insurance industry, retail management, international trade, and research projects. I am employed by the State of Minnesota. I spent three years working at Minnesota Department of Health, managing grants awarded to peoples of color: American Indian, Latino, African American, and Asian American populations. I then moved to the Department of Education in September 2012, where I continued to provide Fiscal Management to special education grantees. I earned a statistics and applied economics degree from Rwanda; I also have a bachelor degree in Business Administration from Iowa State University, Ames, Iowa; and MBA in Information Technology Management from Capella University, Minneapolis, Minnesota.

The people in the produce industry take advantage of farmers and there hard labor and I am trying to change that.  They deserve more for what they do.  I take their fruit and sell and market it to super markets and wholesalers.  I also like to educate people about all of the exotic fruits out there because there are so many of them and they just get thrown out here in the U.S.  It is very wasteful.

Matthew 25:35-40   For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me.’
“Then the righteous will answer him, ‘Lord, when did we see you hungry and feed you, or thirsty and give you something to drink? When did we see you a stranger and invite you in, or needing clothes and clothe you? When did we see you sick or in prison and go to visit you?’
“The King will reply, ‘Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.’

lenders.name: Geraldine
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that independence, especially for women, is important to the quality of their lives. it gives them options and choices.

I live in the USA: my sister Margaret lives in the UK. We are making joint loans. I thought this was a good way of bringing us more closely together and giving us a shared interest while helping others at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan meetings and events for companies, and organize community projects and give back get back events for those businesses wishing to involve themselves in social corporate responsibility. I also write a column on corporate social responsibility for Incentive Magazine Online, based in the USA.
